modName: UNP Spice Gear Collection with belly support
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]UNP Spice Gear Collection with belly support[/size]

Armor is the same as the original by tiwa44, I just added belly support. Metal armours do not have bouncing boobs.
The package includes the following armours: bandit, blades, dbarmor, dragonbone, dragonscale, draugr, dwarven, elven,generaltulius, hide, imperial, iron, stormcloaks, studded, thievesguild.

[color=#ff0000]This is not a complete MOD ! For proper function, you must first install the original MOD [/color][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68028/?]UNP Spice Gear Collection[/url] by [b]tiwa44[/b][/size][color=#ff0000]  [/color]

[color=#e69138]Credits:

tiwa44 for the original
Dimon99 for the UNP body
Caliente and Cell for Outfit Studio
Bethesda for Skyrim[/color]
author: poblivion
